ygData.subject: Re: Fwd: I run the shadow knight mailing list
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Well, that s a general problem with the messageboards (and the reason these lists exist).  It s frustrating, I know, however the people at Verant DO read
ygData.messageBody:
>not to be rude myself, but, who has the time to sit and wait for the
>general messageboard to come up within its 5-10 minutes?

Well, that's a general problem with the messageboards (and the reason these
lists exist). It's frustrating, I know, however the people at Verant DO
read those messageboards. Just pick and choose which ones you want to
read/contribute to. I look at the General and Developer boards on eqvault,
and that's about it, and it's still frustrating since they are very high
traffic, high noise, and get recycled after a day.

But even then, I've found a lot of very good discussion about SKs in
general, many of which mirror (and expand upon) the discussion here.

>If someone could perhaps give me a website with a good board, particularly
>class-based or server-based, and not having to deal with the slowness of
>the vault, I would highly appreciate it if the URL was posted or given to
>me, thanks in advance

This would be a generally useful thing. I actually think that a good
messageboard reorganization at the Vault would be helpful. I'm thinking
about a LOT of messageboards so that there are a lot of messageboards but
each has minimal traffic. A messageboard per trade skill, class, race, and
server would be a good start, then a few more miscellaneous ones (e.g.
"General", "Bugs", etc.). It would be a lot of message boards, but it
would likely help things out a lot.

Brian
